official_title: A bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to extend for 3 years the program of assistance for population research and voluntary family planning programs.

summary.text: Extends through fiscal year 1976 the program of assistance for population research and voluntary family planning programs under title X of the Public Health Service Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title X of the Public Health Service Act to extend for 3 years the program of assistance for population research and voluntary family planning programs.
